name: Beginner's hat
description: This hat is there purely for style. Maybe you should change for a better one as soon as possible...

name: Regular t-shirt
description: This is the t-shirt you were wearing when you first started your adventure. It is full of memories...

name: Regular short
description: This is the short you were wearing when you first started your adventure. It is full of memories...

name: Old leather boots
description: What a stylish cloth... Unfortunately, it won't protect you much. You'd probably better save them for special occasions...

name: Construction worker's helmet
description: Offers a great compromise between weight and resistence.

name: Oversized winter jacket
description: It is so large that it becomes able to absorb some damage!

name: Kevlar jeans
descript̂ion: Kevlar is a pretty strong material, and it keeps you agile!

name: Brand new leather boots
description: These shoes still looks good, but they don't have the same flavour as their classical counterpart.
